name: SEAL FORCE
description:
While you and your seal clan were away for winter, some jerk built a dumb house on your favorite island for mating! Time to show this loser who's boss around here... SEAL FORCE!

Control an army of seals to bounce over walls, sneak past the homeowner, lock him out of his own home, then destroy it entirely! 

You will enjoy watching fat bouncy seals destroy everything. Just don't let him catch you! He will drag your seals away one by one if you're not careful, and you will certainly need all of them to work together in order to destroy his house and reclaim your island!

A game by: Two Critters

Gunther Fox: Programming, Game Design

Meg Viola: Art, Animation, VFX, Tech Art

Thanks to Freesound.org for the sound effects.

Thanks to Universal Production Music for background music

Most of all thanks to Seals, for being so round and good.
